import react,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' import Loader from './loader' const MyData = ()=>{ const [username,setUsername] = useState("") const [userSeacrchedData,setUserSearchedData] = useState({}) const [loader,setLoader] = useState(false) useEffect(()=>{ setUsername("zadfab") getData() return( console.clear() ) },[]) useEffect(()=>{ getData() },[username]) const getData = async()=>{ const userData = await axios( { method: 'GET', url:`https://api.github.com/users/${username}`, } ).then((response)=>{ setUserSearchedData(response.data) console.log(response) }).catch((error)=>{ console.log(error) }) } return ( <>

Search your user name

Go Back
{return(setUsername(e.target.value));setLoader(false)}}/>
{loader?

Name

{userSeacrchedData.name}

Location

{userSeacrchedData.location}

Date Joined

{(userSeacrchedData.created_at).toString().split('T')[0]}

Email

Follower

{userSeacrchedData.followers}

Following

{userSeacrchedData.following}

Public Reposetries

{userSeacrchedData.public_repos}

Type

{userSeacrchedData.type}

:} ) } export default MyData
